quoteText: After a Snap is deleted, we’ll mainly be able to see the basic details — like when it was sent and who it was sent to.
title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
tosdr.tldr: They say that „Mainly“ they can only see basic information. Obviously that implies that they may save any other data as well so that exceptions to the „Mainly“ are possible.
